definition: to visit a sick person or patient
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Are there any regulations about the time of visiting patients?
sentences.chinese: 醫院對探病的時間有規定嗎？

sentences.english: The visiting hours are from 8am to 7 pm.
sentences.chinese: 探病時間是上午8點到下午7點。

sentences.english: Thee nurse informed me that visiting hours were over.
sentences.chinese: 護士告訴我探病時間已經結束了。

sentences.english: The nurse informed me that visiting hours were over.
sentences.chinese: 護士告訴我探病時間已經結束了。

sentences.english: Ss learned that city really sick from true home to visit the city later.
sentences.chinese: 三順得知熙真生病的音訊後來熙真家探病。

sentences.english: Visiting hours are from 1 to 7 on weekdays. He's in Ward A, room 312.
sentences.chinese: 探病時間是每天下午一點到七點，他在A樓312室。

definition: to visit/to call on sb/to look around
to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
to visit/to pay a call to
to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
to visit the bereaved to offer one's condolences
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
to pay one's respects/to give regards to
to hasten home for the funeral of a parent or grandparent
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
a worship ceremony for the dead/to offer sacrifice (to ancestors)/a libation
